name: Open_New_Account
description: Help to open up new bank account

sampleUtterances.utterance: I want to join this bank

plainTextMessage.value: Sorry. Visit our one of the branch.

To open account,you can either walk in to the bank with ID proof like Canadian passport/status card/Driver's license.Alternatively you can also go to https://www.lakeheadbank.com/openaccount/ ==>Fill in the details and submit==>The details you submitted will be reviewed and you will receive a mail with in 5 business days.
